Subject: <U+6F22, U+5B57>

Parse:
  - 漢字
  - <U+6F22, U+5B57>
  - 漢: U+6F22 CJK UNIFIED IDEOGRAPH-6F22
  - 字: U+5B57 CJK UNIFIED IDEOGRAPH-5B57

Decompose:
  - <U+003C, U+0055, U+002B, U+0036, U+0046, U+0032, U+0032, U+002C, U+0020, U+0055, U+002B, U+0035, U+0042, U+0035, U+0037, U+003E>
  - <: U+003C LESS-THAN SIGN
  - U: U+0055 LATIN CAPITAL LETTER U
  - +: U+002B PLUS SIGN
  - 6: U+0036 DIGIT SIX
  - F: U+0046 LATIN CAPITAL LETTER F
  - 2: U+0032 DIGIT TWO
  - 2: U+0032 DIGIT TWO
  - ,: U+002C COMMA
  -  : U+0020 SPACE (SP)
  - U: U+0055 LATIN CAPITAL LETTER U
  - +: U+002B PLUS SIGN
  - 5: U+0035 DIGIT FIVE
  - B: U+0042 LATIN CAPITAL LETTER B
  - 5: U+0035 DIGIT FIVE
  - 7: U+0037 DIGIT SEVEN
  - >: U+003E GREATER-THAN SIGN

Escape:
  CSV: "<U+6F22, U+5B57>"
  HTML3: &lt;U+6F22, U+5B57&gt;
  HTML4: &lt;U+6F22, U+5B57&gt;
  XML10: &lt;U+6F22, U+5B57&gt;
  XML11: &lt;U+6F22, U+5B57&gt;
  XSI: \<U+6F22,\ U+5B57\>
